t: Garcia Vinyl Re-Issue Now Available For Pre-Order - Jerry Garcia
s: On April 19th, Round Records will re-issue Garcia, Jerry Garcia’s solo debut, in two configurations: a limited edition, white 180 gram vinyl with individually numbered foil-stamped packaging in an edition of 1,500 and an open edition 180 gram black vinyl package.
